EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to PostalManager when Lead is Closed Won
EmailTemplate.name: RetailSMB_LeadClosedWon_PostalManager
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Contacting Australia Post
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name_of_lead_creator__c},
We are pleased to inform you that the new lead you raised ({!Lead.Lead_Number__c}) has now been verified and converted into an opportunity.
Thank you for taking part in the Small Business Engagement Program.
Thank you,
Australia Post.
